CommentBody:
"To enable Role Based Access within Enterprise Auditor, corresponding roles must first be created within SQL Management Studio. Then Enterprise Auditor users must be assigned roles both in SQL Management Studio and in Enterprise Auditor."

Have SQL roles been created?

https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Admin/Settings/Access/RoleBased/ConfigureRoles.htm

He said that he will review the article and contact me through the case if he wants to meet to walk through this on Monday, 30-Sep (or on the next available day).
